title: Tribunal Quick Question (I'm new) Don't hurt me please
body: I know the Tribunal system is no longer being used but I just has a quick question. Did the LoL Tribunal system record audio logs I know they recorded text chat but I just figured it would kinda be a violation of privacy if they did. Anyway thanks for any answers. I thought I'd just leave this question here as I couldn't find a legitimate spot.

replies.body: There was no necessity for the Tribunal system to consider voice chat as the voice chat feature was added much more recently, several years after the Tribunal system was scrapped.
